title: P7 What can I do if my phone runs sluggishly?
answer:
lGo to **Phone Manager**, touch **Scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to optimize your phone. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35544)


 lGo to **Phone Manager**, touch **Phone accelerator**, and follow the onscreen instructions to close applications not in use. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35545)


 lGo to **Phone Manager**, touch **Storage cleaner**, and follow the onscreen instructions to perform a smart scan, and clear the application cache, system trash files, applications not in use and their installation packages, and large files, such as videos. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35546) 

 lRestart your phone. 

 If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings. 

 Note: The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
